about_the_game:
Kredits in the game

Kredits are a universal currency in Warface: Clutch. They allow you to perform many actions in the game:
  • purchase items in the store,
  • skip game event tasks if you don’t want to do them yourself,
  • and more.

Kredits are not a mandatory currency and most of the items in the game can be obtained without them. However, Kredits often help speed up the process if you’re on a time crunch.

Please note: you can’t buy every item in the game with Kredits and many articles in Warface: Clutch can only be obtained by playing the game.

After payment, the bought Kredits will appear on your in-game account. Please wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

Important: This pack is intended only for Warface: Clutch players on the Amsterdam, Hong Kong, São Paulo servers.

Since the pack contains currency, it is not refundable. We can not refund your money after you make a purchase.

Kredits in the game

Kredits are a universal currency in Warface: Clutch. They allow you to perform many actions in the game:
  • purchase items in the store,
  • skip game event tasks if you don’t want to do them yourself,
  • and more.

Kredits are not a mandatory currency and most of the items in the game can be obtained without them. However, Kredits often help speed up the process if you’re on a time crunch.

Please note: you can’t buy every item in the game with Kredits and many articles in Warface: Clutch can only be obtained by playing the game.

After payment, the bought Kredits will appear on your in-game account. Please wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

Important: This pack is intended only for Warface: Clutch players on the Amsterdam, Hong Kong, São Paulo servers.

Since the pack contains currency, it is not refundable. We can not refund your money after you make a purchase.

name: Warface: Clutch — Currency Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
